articles.title: Oil prices extend gains after US crude stocks draw - The Economic Times
articles.description: Brent crude futures rose 29 cents, or 0.4%, to $77.88 a barrel at 0138 GMT, while U.S. West Texas Intermediate crude futures climbed 29 cents, or 0.4%, to $72.53 a barrel.
